about.firstParagraph: Mehdi DIAS GOMES, 21 years old, Full Stack Developer Apprentice, Metz
about.secondParagraph: Passionate about web development, I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Full Stack Web Development at Metz Numeric School. As an apprentice, I am gaining hands-on experience in full stack development and acquiring valuable skills in the field.
